title: सोने से लदे पाकिस्तानी नागरिक की तस्वीर तिरुपति बालाजी मंदिर के पुजारी के रूप में साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: He’s a pandit of a very famous temple in India. His daughters wore jewellery weighing 125 kilos. on their marriage. Please stop donating jewellery to temples. It makes zero sense anyways. Donate it to a poor man if you are dying to. Why to a temple? pic.twitter.com/ioXSBFugEK
